title: Speed Change Analyzer
description: Interactive visualization showing when an object is speeding up vs slowing down based on the signs of velocity and acceleration. Features three synchronized graphs (position, velocity, acceleration), color-coded regions, animated particle with speed indicator, and sign comparison table.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Kinematics
Velocity
Acceleration
Motion Analysis
prerequisites: Understanding of position, velocity, and acceleration
Ability to read and interpret graphs
Concept of derivatives as rates of change
learningObjective: Students will determine when an object speeds up or slows down based on the signs of velocity and acceleration
